title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 50.17 - Safeguarding and disposing of lasers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 50.17 - Safeguarding and disposing of lasers

State Regulations
(a) Safeguarding. Each laser shall be
safeguarded against unauthorized use. (b) Disposing. No person shall dispose of a
high-intensity laser except by making such laser permanently inoperative or by
transferring such laser to another person. The recipient of any such
transferred laser, if subject to the provisions of the Labor Law, shall obtain
the required registration in accordance with section
50.8
of this Part (rule) and shall
display the proof of such registration to the person disposing of such
high-intensity laser. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
50.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
